verses.verse: Again in the <S%H8671>ninth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> in the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H853><s%> even of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5564>set<s%> himself <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H4911>utter<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> Set <S%H8239>on<s%> a <S%H5518>pot,<s%> set it <S%H8239>on,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> into it:

Gather <S%H622><s%> the <S%H5409>pieces<s%> thereof <S%H413>into<s%> it, even <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H5409>piece,<s%> the <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and the <S%H3802>shoulder;<s%> <S%H4390>fill<s%> it with the <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H6106>bones.<s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> the <S%H4005>choice<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and <S%H1752>burn<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it, and make it <S%H7570>boil<s%> <S%H7571>well,<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> let them <S%H1310>seethe<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of it <S%H8432>therein.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> to the <S%H5518>pot<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H2457>scum<s%> is therein, and whose <S%H2457>scum<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> gone <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it! bring it <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H5409>piece<s%> by <S%H5409>piece;<s%> let <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it.

For <S%H3588><s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her; she <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock;<s%> she <S%H8210>poured<s%> it <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>ground,<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H5921><s%> it with <S%H6083>dust;<s%>

That it might cause <S%H2534>fury<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5358>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance;<s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6706>top<s%> of a <S%H5553>rock,<s%> that it should <S%H1115>not<s%> be <S%H3680>covered.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H188>Woe<s%> to the <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H5892>city!<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H1571>even<s%> make the pile for <S%H4071>fire<s%> <S%H1431>great.<s%>

Heap <S%H7235>on<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H1814>kindle<s%> the <S%H784>fire,<s%> <S%H8552>consume<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and spice it <S%H7543>well,<s%> <S%H4841><s%> and let the <S%H6106>bones<s%> be <S%H2787>burned.<s%>

Then <S%H5975>set<s%> it <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1513>coals<s%> thereof, <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H5178>brass<s%> of it may be <S%H2552>hot,<s%> and may <S%H2787>burn,<s%> and that the <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> of it may be <S%H5413>molten<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> it, that the <S%H2457>scum<s%> of it may be <S%H8552>consumed.<s%>

She hath <S%H3811>wearied<s%> herself with <S%H8383>lies,<s%> and her <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2457>scum<s%> went not <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3808><s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> her: her <S%H2457>scum<s%> shall be in the <S%H784>fire.<s%>

In thy <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> is <S%H2154>lewdness:<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> I have <S%H2891>purged<s%> thee, and thou wast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2891>purged,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H2891>purged<s%> from thy <S%H4480>filthiness<s%> <S%H2932><s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> I have <S%H853>caused<s%> my <S%H2534>fury<s%> to <S%H5117>rest<s%> upon thee.

I <S%H589><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it: it shall come to <S%H935>pass,<s%> and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> it; I will <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H6544>back,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H2347>spare,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H5162>repent;<s%> according to thy <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and according to thy <S%H5949>doings,<s%> shall they <S%H8199>judge<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>
Also the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I take <S%H3947>away<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> with a <S%H4046>stroke:<s%> yet <S%H3808>neither<s%> shalt thou <S%H5594>mourn<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1058>weep,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall thy <S%H1832>tears<s%> run <S%H935>down.<s%>

Forbear <S%H1826><s%> to <S%H602>cry,<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> for the <S%H4191>dead,<s%> <S%H2280>bind<s%> the tire of thine <S%H6287>head<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and put <S%H7760>on<s%> thy <S%H5275>shoes<s%> upon thy <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H5844>cover<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> thy <S%H8222>lips,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H376>men.<s%>

So I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> and at <S%H6153>even<s%> my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4191>died;<s%> and I <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I was <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Wilt thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> us <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things are to us, <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H6213>doest<s%> so?
Then I <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H413><s%> them, The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H2490>profane<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of your <S%H5797>strength,<s%> the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and that which your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H4263>pitieth;<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> ye have <S%H5800>left<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And ye shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H6213>done:<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5844>cover<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H8222>lips,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H376>men.<s%>

And your <S%H6287>tires<s%> shall be <S%H5921>upon<s%> your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> and your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> upon your <S%H7272>feet:<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5594>mourn<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1058>weep;<s%> but ye shall pine <S%H4743>away<s%> for your <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> and <S%H5098>mourn<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H251>another.<s%>

Thus <S%H3168>Ezekiel<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> unto you a <S%H4159>sign:<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do:<s%> and when this <S%H935>cometh,<s%> ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD.<s%>

Also, <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> shall it <S%H3808>not<s%> be in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> their <S%H4581>strength,<s%> the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of their <S%H8597>glory,<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4261>desire<s%> of their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and that whereupon they <S%H4853>set<s%> their <S%H5315>minds,<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters,<s%>
That he that <S%H6412>escapeth<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, to cause thee to <S%H2045>hear<s%> it with thine <S%H241>ears?<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H853><s%> to him which is <S%H6412>escaped,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and be no more <S%H481>dumb:<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5750><s%> and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4159>sign<s%> unto them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
